title: Urgent MEDEVAC Resource Allocation
description: A logistics officer must coordinate an urgent medical evacuation (MEDEVAC) for a critically wounded soldier from a remote location.

tasks.description: Receive the 9-line MEDEVAC request and identify the patient's location and medical condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly processes the MEDEVAC request details.

tasks.description: Identify the nearest available MEDEVAC helicopter and the closest medical facility capable of treating the injuries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer finds the optimal combination of transport and medical facility.

tasks.description: Task the helicopter, provide the destination, and monitor the mission's progress.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully launches and tracks the MEDEVAC mission.
